readable.title: 3503011427_a4ee547c77
readable.content: A man in a long sleeved white shirt is walking past something called the lounge bar . A man in a white longsleeve shirt and black pants is walking on the sidewalk . A man is walking down a sidewalk under a " lounge bar " sign . A man walks on a fancy sidewalk next to an abandoned bar . The man wearing a white jacket and black pants is walking in front of a white building .
